name: Solitower
description:
Blast your way through this fast paced tower defense, but there is one catch: You can only place one tower at a time! Strategize, and quickly switch between the 6 towers in the game to last as long as you can!

This game was made for the BenBonk jam!

Coder / Artist: NovaKnight

Coding help: Curruff

Sound Designer: Nickaronii
